thread.title: somebody wants to do a mod ?

post.author: bdmn
post.body:
hi folks

im looking for people who want to participate in a mod project. its about a teambased multiplayergame including ai monsters, turrets, bases, upgrades, etc.

i provide a good developing enviroment including a svn, trac, wiki and all we need.

if u got some skills in c/c++, gtkradiant or other technologies related to the id tech 4 engine, feel free to introduce yourself or send me a pm.


for my person:

im 25 years old. im a programmer since around 8 years and want to get this mod done


bdmn

post.author: gavavva
post.body: Woa, slow down with all the info, I don't even know how to take it all in!!

post.author: =FF=Sturm
shaviro
post.body: I don't think Windows XP has crashed on me (for non-hardware issues) yet after what? 8 years of diverse use?

post.author: reko
post.body:
shaviro wrote:
I don't think Windows XP has crashed on me (for non-hardware issues) yet after what? 8 years of diverse use?


Windows XP FTW. Never crashes withouth any reason like viruses.

post.author: aphexjh
post.body: how did this get derailed to being about windows?

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: post 2 & 3 were being jerks. Hence the derailment.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
Time to get it back on the rails...
bdmn wrote:
hi folks

im looking for people who want to participate in a mod project. its about a teambased multiplayergame including ai monsters, turrets, bases, upgrades, etc.

i provide a good developing enviroment including a svn, trac, wiki and all we need.

for my person:

im 25 years old. im a programmer since around 8 years and want to get this mod done


bdmn

Can we have more information on what you are planning for the mod? Maybe if you have some pre work you could show us what you have done sofar.

post.author: geX
post.body:
reko wrote:
shaviro wrote:
I don't think Windows XP has crashed on me (for non-hardware issues) yet after what? 8 years of diverse use?


Windows XP FTW. Never crashes withouth any reason like viruses.


I still use vista since it came out. Never crashed for me either (also non-hardware). Windows will only crash if use it the wrong way or abuse it.
